1: <pb/><t>Ri caquijiquiba' qui c'u'x</t> <t>chrij ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>man queslabetaj taj;</t> <t>quejunamataj ruc' ri juyub Sion,</t> <t>kas xa jumul e jekelic.</t>
2: <t>Jacha' ri juyub</t> <t>quisutim rij ri Jerusalen,</t> <t>ri Ajawaxel u sutim rij ri u tinimit</t> <t>camic xukuje' amak'el.</t>
3: <t>Ri itzel k'atan tzij</t> <t>man amak'el tak cätakan</t> <t>cho ri ulew ri u yo'm ri Dios</t> <t>che ri u tinimit,</t> <t>muchaplej c'u ne' ri u tinimit</t> <t>u banic ri etzelal.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Ajawaxel, bana' la utzil</t> <t>chque ri e utzalaj tak winak,</t> <t>chque ri suc'um ri canima';</t>
5: <t>e are' c'u ri quebin</t> <t>pa ri itzel be bana' la</t> <t>chi je cäquitaklebej</t> <t>jas ri cäquitaklebej</t> <t>ri itzel tak winak. <pb/>¡Chc'ol c'u jamaril pa Israel!</t>
